prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of an elderly, extremely muscular man, deep tan skin tone, bald head, long flowing white beard, iconic red sunglasses, vibrant Hawaiian shirt
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, extreme detailed skin wrinkles and age spots, visible pores, realistic hair strands on beard, sharp reflections on red sunglasses
